name: Project Fazbear
description:
Welcome to Fredbear's Inclusive Pizzeria! Wh- Oh forget this...

Hello everyone! Welcome to Project Fazbear!

A FNAF porn dating game where you date 5 characters:

  • Candy
  • Doug
  • Freddy
  • Fredbear
  • Springbonnie

This game is in heavy development. So expect some terrible jank here & there...

Made in Renpy Backgrounds by Kehevil This game idea came from my friend Akio
